name: Spinning Love
description:
Made for NaNoRenO 2023!

Play as a cool boombox guy named Wave, and watch him try to be less cool to start loving! There's no alternate ending or choices, and it should be around a 15 minute read through the story.

This is the first game I've ever made, art and music by me! It's nothing spectacular, and rushed in some aspects, but I hope you enjoy it either way. Have a good day!

SPECIAL THANKS: boldomeVEVO, SlamTopHatMan, RottyUnwoven, whensrell, 2Mariotic, luckichaiki, NiccYeet, and the rest of my friends who cheered me on!

Like the music? You can listen & download it at https://kikipotions.bandcamp.com/album/spinning-love-original-soundtrack
